column1: The syllabus isn't being completed on time.
Wi-Fi doesn't work properly in the hostel.
The admin office is delaying scholarship approvals.
Professors don't respond to doubts after class.
There are not enough fans in the lecture hall.
The fee payment portal is often down.
Lab equipment is outdated and often broken.
The office lost my ID card application.
Assignments are too frequent and disorganized.
